original_text: And he shall make amends for the harm that he hath done in the holy thing, and shall add the fifth part thereto, and give it unto the priest: and the priest shall make an atonement for him with the ram of the trespass offering, and it shall be forgiven him.
korean_text: 성물에 대한 잘못을 보상하되 그것에 오분의 일을 더하여 제사장에게 줄 것이요 제사장은 그 속건제의 숫양으로 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And he shall make amends for the harm
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 피해에 대해 보상해야 하며

sentences.original_text: that he hath done in the holy thing,
and shall add the fifth part thereto,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것에 오분의 일을 더해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and give it unto the priest:
and the priest shall make an atonement for him
with the ram of the trespass offering,
and it shall be forgiven him.
